title.rendered: Join The MingleCity Newsletter [for the Michael Baisden Travel Club]

content.rendered:
By Joining Michael’s Travel Club, you’ll receive benefits like these:

  • Weekly Commentary
  • Upcoming Events
  • First notification for concerts, seminars, travel club and other events
  • Discount on merchandising

Join the Michael Baisden Travel Club

Stop dreaming about travel! Stop making excuses, pack a bag, and let’s go! Just fill out the form below.

JOIN THE

MingleCity Newsletter

We respect your email privacy

 

Having trouble signing up? Click here, we can help!
